body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.20.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#613](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/613) Bump scala-maven-plugin from 3.4.4 to 3.4.6
* [#611](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/611) Bump jdbi3-bom from 3.5.1 to 3.6.0
* [#610](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/610) Bump httpcore from 4.4.10 to 4.4.11
* [#609](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/609) Bump mysql-connector-java from 5.1.45 to 5.1.47
* [#608](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/608) Implement initial (simple) validation profile support
* [#605](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/605) Bump maven-surefire-plugin from 2.20 to 2.22.1
* [#604](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/604) Bump mysql-connector-java from 5.1.45 to 6.0.6
* [#603](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/603) Bump maven-war-plugin from 2.6 to 3.2.2
* [#602](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/602) Bump jdbi3-bom from 3.1.0 to 3.5.1
* [#601](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/601) Bump scala-maven-plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.4.4
* [#600](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/600) Bump slf4j-api from 1.7.7 to 1.7.25
* [#599](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/599) Bump asm-analysis from 6.1.1 to 6.2.1
* [#598](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/598) Bump commons-pool2 from 2.4.3 to 2.6.0
* [#597](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/597) Bump ant from 1.8.2 to 1.10.5
* [#596](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/596) Bump commons-cli from 1.3.1 to 1.4
* [#595](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/595) Bump maven-resources-plugin from 2.7 to 3.1.0
* [#594](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/594) Bump commons-io from 2.4 to 2.6
* [#593](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/593) Bump mysql-connector-java from 5.1.45 to 8.0.13
* [#592](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/592) Bump version.io.thorntail from 2.2.1.Final to 2.3.0.Final
* [#591](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/591) Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.3 to 1.6.8
* [#590](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/590) Bump maven-jar-plugin from 2.5 to 3.1.1
* [#589](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/589) Bump gatling-maven-plugin from 2.2.0 to 3.0.1
* [#588](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/588) Bump buildnumber-maven-plugin from 1.3 to 1.4
* [#587](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/587) Bump asm-analysis from 6.1.1 to 7.0
* [#586](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/586) Bump maven-assembly-plugin from 2.5 to 3.1.1
* [#585](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/585) Bump maven-surefire-report-plugin from 2.20 to 2.22.1
* [#584](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/584) Bump json from 20160212 to 20180813
* [#583](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/583) Bump httpclient from 4.5.3 to 4.5.6
* [#582](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/582) Build: The dot-git-plugin fails when building from downloaded (zip'd) sources
* [#581](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/581) Bump git-commit-id-plugin from 2.2.1 to 2.2.6
* [#580](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/580) Bump maven-bundle-plugin from 2.5.3 to 4.1.0
* [#579](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/579) Bump version.org.keycloak from 4.8.2.Final to 4.8.3.Final
* [#578](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/578) Bump maven-clean-plugin from 2.6 to 3.1.0
* [#577](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/577) Bump commons-beanutils from 1.9.2 to 1.9.3
* [#576](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/576) Bump build-helper-maven-plugin from 1.9.1 to 3.0.0
* [#575](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/575) Bump httpcore from 4.4.8 to 4.4.10
* [#574](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/574) Bump cdi-api from 1.2 to 2.0
* [#573](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/573) Bump jboss-websocket-api_1.1_spec from 1.1.1.Final to 1.1.3.Final
* [#572](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/572) Bump postgresql from 9.4.1212 to 42.2.5
* [#571](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/571) Editor: use consistent icons for Undo/Redo
* [#569](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/569) Github.com: New private repositories not shown in Repository list
* [#568](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/568) Bump maven-compiler-plugin from 3.2 to 3.8.0
* [#567](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/567) Bump jdbi3 from 3.0.0-beta1 to 3.0.0-beta2
* [#564](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/564) Apicurio Studio Beta 2.19 - Github linking authentication error
* [#563](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/563) Bump version.io.prometheus from 0.1.0 to 0.6.0
* [#562](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/562) Bump maven-dependency-plugin from 3.0.2 to 3.1.1
* [#561](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/561) Bump h2 from 1.3.173 to 1.4.197
* [#560](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/560) Bump maven-source-plugin from 2.4 to 3.0.1
* [#559](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/559) Bump commons-codec from 1.10 to 1.11
* [#558](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/558) Bump jsonschema2pojo-core from 0.5.1 to 1.0.0
* [#557](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/557) Bump jboss-jaxrs-api_2.0_spec from 1.0.1.Beta1 to 1.0.1.Final
* [#556](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/556) Bump javapoet from 1.10.0 to 1.11.1
* [#555](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/555) Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 2.10.4 to 3.0.1
* [#554](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/554) Bump resteasy-jaxrs from 3.1.3.Final to 3.6.2.Final
* [#552](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/552) [Security] Bump scala-library from 2.11.7 to 2.12.8
* [#551](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/551) [Security] Bump version.org.keycloak from 4.1.0.Final to 4.8.2.Final
* [#550](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/550) Bump junit from 4.11 to 4.12
* [#549](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/549) Bump maven-gpg-plugin from 1.5 to 1.6
* [#548](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/548) Bump version.io.gatling from 3.0.0 to 3.0.2
* [#547](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/547) Bump version.com.fasterxml.jackson from 2.9.7 to 2.9.8
* [#546](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/546) Editor: Adjustable Property label size in Design mode
* [#545](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/545) Mock with Microcks action support
* [#544](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/544) Editor: Indent the scope checkboxes when editing Security Requirements
* [#543](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/543) Editor: Update "scopes" text when adding Security Requirements
* [#542](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/542) Microcks:  Hide the "Mock with Microcks" action for OAS 2.0 APIs
* [#541](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/541) Editor: fix size of New Data Type template radio buttons
* [#538](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/538) Adding Header parameters to design view
* [#534](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/534) Cannot publish to GitLab onto git-flow style branch (i.e. a branch with a '/' character in the name)
* [#532](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/532) Text with Chinese characters
* [#531](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/531) Check for rawgit usage
* [#530](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/530) Publishing to a branch in Bitbucket is not working
* [#529](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/529) Unable to Publish to Local GitLab "no matching options"
* [#527](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/527) Generating thorntail stubs fails on this openapi spec
* [#514](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/514) Editor: Make allowed character rules always visible on Add Data Type editor/dialog
* [#497](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/497) UX: Update the L&F of responses to the flat tab look
* [#369](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/369) Integration: Microcks


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.20
